1569.name: SS 6356 (40 HRc)
1569.Applications: High alloyed, age-hardenable alloy for high wear resistant clad layers combined with galling and high working temperatures.
1569.Suitable_For: Age-hardenable alloy for high wear resistan clad layers on cold and hot working tools. Repair, preventive maintenance and production of highly stressed cold and hot working tools, such as punching dies, cold and hot cutting knives, Al-dies cast moulds, cold forging dies, drawing, stamping- and chamfering tools.
